PHRASE.LANG: Explore PlayStation®Home in style, on this slick and modern vehicle! The wheels feature a pulsating neon light, which cycles through all colours. Hear the buzz of the electric engine as you travel around, and press square to turbo to the top speed! [#Legal]

Explorez PlayStation®Home avec style, aux commandes de ce véhicule moderne et élégant! Les roues sont ornées d'une lumière néon qui change de couleur et varie en intensité. Ecoutez le bourdonnement du moteur électrique, et pressez carré pour atteindre la vitesse maximale! [#Legal]
Entdecken Sie über PlayStation®Home in modernem Stil: fahren Sie dieser futuristische animierte Fahrzeug! Die pulsierende Neoneffekten durchlaufen alle Farben.[#Legal]
Esplora PlayStation®Home con stile, con questo veiculo futuristica! Le luci al neon cambiano colore. [#Legal]
Explora PlayStation®Home con estilo, con esto vehículo futuristo. Las luces de neón cambian de color. [#Legal]

Explore PlayStation®Home in style, on this slick and modern vehicle! The wheels feature a pulsating neon light, which cycles through all colors. Hear the buzz of the electric engine as you travel around, and press square to turbo to the top speed! [#Legal]

Explore PlayStation®Home in style, on this slick and modern vehicle! The wheels feature a pulsating neon light, which cycles through all colors. Hear the buzz of the electric engine as you travel around, and press square to turbo to the top speed! [#Legal]
